text: Gaddi Axel Aguirre Ledezma (born March 31, 1996 in Guadalajara, Jalisco) is a Mexican professional footballer who currently plays for Tampico Madero on loan from Club Atlas. ==References== Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Atlas F.C. footballers Category:Tampico Madero F.C. footballers Category:Liga MX players Category:Ascenso MX players Category:Liga Premier de México players Category:Tercera División de México players Category:Footballers from Jalisco Category:Sportspeople from Guadalajara, Jalisco
title: Gaddi Aguirre
